title: Domain 3.4: Given a scenario, troubleshoot common mobile OS and application issues.
content:
🔧 Common Symptoms

  • Application fails to launch: 🛑 May be due to outdated OS, low memory, or corrupted installation.
  • Application fails to close / crashes: 💥 Could be caused by bugs, OS conflicts, or resource overload.
  • Application fails to update: 🔃 Check for Wi-Fi connection, available storage, or app store cache issues.
  • Slow to respond: 🐢 Often tied to background apps using too much memory or CPU.
  • OS fails to update: 🚫 Can happen if storage is full, battery is low, or Wi-Fi is unstable.
  • Battery life issues: 🔋 Caused by background apps, outdated firmware, or worn battery.
  • Randomly reboots: 🔁 Likely linked to unstable apps, overheating, or OS glitches.
  • Connectivity issues: 📶 May involve multiple interfaces:
    • Bluetooth: Try unpairing and re-pairing the device.
    • Wi-Fi: Toggle airplane mode or reset network settings.
    • NFC: Ensure it’s enabled and device is positioned correctly.
    • AirDrop: Check visibility and both Wi-Fi/Bluetooth settings.
  • Screen does not autorotate: 🔄 Could be due to rotation lock or malfunctioning accelerometer.
